section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This statement is ambiguous. While it states that the Managers will determine the Purpose of the Venture, it doesn't specify *how* this determination is made. Does it require a unanimous decision by the managers, or a simple majority? It also doesn't provide any guidance or limitations on what the Purpose can be. This lack of clarity could lead to disputes if the Managers disagree or if the Purpose they determine is contrary to the initial intent of the Members.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: The purpose of the venture is not clearly defined and it is said that it will be determined by the managers. The ambiguity in this section creates a structural flaw because it is not clear what the venture is actually supposed to do or accomplish. This section does not make sense in the context of legally binding documents.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a clear inconsistency in the stated Agreed Value for JVLS, LLC. The text describes their contribution as '$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Addition to The Total Contributions.' However, the agreed value is listed as '$3,500,000.00 USD'. This represents a significant discrepancy and a potential material misrepresentation of the actual capital contribution made by JVLS, LLC.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The Capital Contribution for BorrowMoney.com, inc is listed as 'To be determined USD'. This creates ambiguity, as the actual contribution of BorrowMoney.com is not specified. This lack of a defined contribution could lead to disputes regarding their stake in the Venture and their obligations.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This clause grants excessive discretionary power to the remaining members in determining the value of the Venture and a withdrawing member's interest. The phrase 'in a manner deemed appropriate' is highly subjective and provides no objective criteria for valuation. This lack of transparency and defined methodology could easily lead to unfair or predatory valuations, potentially harming the withdrawing member's financial interests.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This is an example of structural flaws in text because the text is not structured properly and it does not make sense. This clause is vague, arbitrary and invites abuse of power against a withdrawing member. This section does not make sense in the context of legally binding documents because there should be no unmonitored discretion by the remaining members.
